typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProviderName as string,
		ProviderXref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select  [ProviderName], [ProviderXref] From [dbo].[Stg_Claim]',
	format: 'query') ~> SourceStageClaim
source(output(
		ProviderFullName as string,
		ProviderXRef as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select [ProviderFullName], [ProviderXRef] From [dbo].[DimProvider]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceDimProvider
SourceStageClaim, sourceDimProvider lookup(ProviderName == ProviderFullName
	&& SourceStageClaim@ProviderXref == sourceDimProvider@ProviderXRef,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupForProvider
LookupForProvider sink(input(
		ProviderID as integer,
		ProviderFirstname as string,
		ProviderMiddlename as string,
		ProviderLastName as string,
		ProviderFullName as string,
		ProviderXRef as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProviderFullName = ProviderName,
		ProviderXRef = SourceStageClaim@ProviderXref
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkDimProvider
